co.paralleluniverse.actors

Interface LifecycleMessage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExitMessage, ShutdownMessage

    public interface LifecycleMessage
extends Serializable
    A message that is automatically generated by an actor upon some lifecycle event (like death) and sent to its watchers or linked actors. LifecycleMessages are handle by an actor's handleLifecycle method.
